name: mri_relabel_nonwm_hypos
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Relabels non-WM hypointensities based on proximity to a nearby label.

inputs.description: Input segmentation file with non-wm-hypos labeled as 80, 81, or 82.
inputs.name: Input Segmentation

inputs.description: Output segmentation file with non-wm-hypos relabeled.
inputs.name: Output Segmentation

inputs.description: Label hypos adjacent to specified segment as a new segment (can be used multiple times).
inputs.name: Segments

inputs.description: Don't run anything, just check options and exit.
inputs.name: Check Options Flag

output-files.description: Output segmentation with non-WM hypointensities relabeled.
output-files.name: Output Segmentation File
